page.title: 05JEFFREY'S FARM
page.content: Situated between Bucks Hill and Chipperfield,{Jeffrey's Farm}is about 200 years old. It used to belong to the ancesters of ex US President Jimmy Carter. The farmhouse itself is 400 years old. The present owners are not farmers but in future years might consider putting the land to agricultural use again. This year they are growing a hay crop and planting trees. The only animals they have are domestic pets. The land is used for cottage gardening. Outbuildings include a barn, two stables for storage and a shed for garden tools. {ALLOTMENTS {40 allotments are situated halfway {down Church Lane. Not all are {currently in use. The yearly rent is {Â£2.50 and they are owned by the Parish {Council.
